QuestData.Title: The Damsel's Luck
QuestData.Description: I know ye just arrived here on the Crimson Veil, but I need to send ye off on another task. The Damsel's Luck is the third ship in me fleet, moored over to the east. Her skipper - Captain Stillwater - is no longer with us.$b$bDamn those masked hoodlums!$b$bAnyhow, Ironpatch told me about yer heroics at sea, and I be runnin' low on quality brigands. I think yer more than capable for this new duty.$b$bCongratulations, matey. Ye be the new captain of the Damsel's Luck.
QuestData.LogDescription: Report to your Captain's Chambers within the Damsel's Luck in the Cape of Stranglethorn.
QuestData.RewardText: You see a set of plans unrolled on the table. They explain everything!$b$bThese are the details of the impending attack on Booty Bay. Battle formations, plans of attack, and something about a group called the "Brashtide Crew".
